Ouinet

Ouinet is an open source library that can be integrated into apps to enable peer-to-peer connectivity and overcome network interference.


CENO Browser

Access web content through a network of cooperating peers - even when the internet is down or censored. Install CENO Browser today and be prepared for the next time you get üîå unplugged.

Paskoocheh

Paskoocheh (Farsi for ‚Äúalley way‚Äù) is an app store that enables easy access to circumvention and privacy tools. Efforts are currently underway to deploy to production a successful Ouinet integration, enabling signed peer-to-peer sharing of updated apps.

Free and Open Source

Interested in enabling Ouinet's peer-to-peer functionality in your app? Visit our Integration Guide.


Ouinet is a project by eQualit.ie ‚Äì a Canadian company developing open and reusable systems with a focus on privacy, online security and freedom of association. Technology solutions and innovations are driven by our values that guide us to protect the rights and aspirations of everyone online.
